title: Add issueDescription textarea to issue creation flow

requirements.summary: Add an `issueDescription` multi-line textarea to the issue creation form and include it in review + submission payload.
acceptanceCriteria: The issue creation form displays a clearly labeled textarea for `issueDescription` (English user-facing label).
The textarea supports multi-line input (Enter inserts a new line and does not accidentally submit the form).
The `issueDescription` value is included in the formâ€™s internal state and is preserved while the user continues the issue creation flow.
If the form has a review/confirmation step, the entered `issueDescription` is displayed in that summary.
Submitting the issue creation form includes the `issueDescription` value in the submission payload used by the app.

file_operations.description: Update the issue creation flow UI to render a clearly labeled `issueDescription` textarea (multi-line) during the issue-details step (e.g., the guided report details step), while keeping single-line input for other steps. Use the shadcn-ui Textarea component (already used elsewhere in the app) to support multi-line input; Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing. Ensure Enter inserts a newline in the textarea (do not intercept Enter-to-send in this mode), preserve the textarea value across navigation within the flow by syncing with the brain/context draft state, and keep the existing review/confirmation summary showing the captured description.

Ensure the issue creation submission action (e.g., guided confirmation submit) includes the captured `issueDescription` value from the current draft/state in the submission payload used by the app (without adding new backend capabilities). Keep behavior changes scoped to the issue creation flow only.
